channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1635; 10:21PM; 1839 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/2TEOLTl; Los Feliz; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 42 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending into the surrounding, large cypress trees. Crews will remain on scene conducting overhaul operations well into the night. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E211 E220 E227 E235 E27 E35 E82 EM11 RA35 RA56 RA82 T11 T20 T27 T35; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1635; 10:06PM; 1839 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/2TEOLTl; Los Feliz; The incident transitioned to a defensive operation as the fire was through the roof of the two story, vacant structure. Firefighters aggressively attacked the fire to prevent it from extending to the exposed large trees (which could have caused further extension) and have knocked back the bulk of those flames. Crews are now returning to the offensive mode as they make entry to the attic to root out the remaining fire. No injuries reported. ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E211 E220 E227 E235 E27 E35 E82 EM11 RA35 RA56 RA82 T11 T20 T27 T35; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1635; 09:39PM; 1839 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/2TEOLTl; Los Feliz; Two story, single family dwelling (vacant) with fire showing from multiple rooms. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are some Cypress trees on the side of the building which are threatened.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E35 E82 RA35 RA82 T35; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1463; 09:27PM; 4300 S Van Buren Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ngwcg3; #VermontSquare; It took 28 firefighters 16 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames in the one-story home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 CM20 CM22 E215 E226 E266 E33 E46 E66 RA246 RA46 RA866 T15 T26 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1463; 09:11PM; 4300 S Van Buren Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ngwcg3; #VermontSquare; *Tentative Address* One-story single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E215 E266 E46 E66 RA246 T15 T66; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1142; 03:57PM; 8406 La Tuna Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qRsvpN; #ShadowHills; Two females were hiking with the three dogs in a remote area of La Tuna Canyon, when sadly, one of the beloved pets experienced a medical emergency and passed away. Firefighters hiked in to assist the small group. Due to the timing of the situation, exhaustion was growing and daylight was dwindling, so firefighters on the ground called for LAFD Air Operations to hoist the two hikers and two remaining pets from the remote location, then firefighters hiked back out with the deceased pet, which was returned to the owner. No injuries. Nothing further. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E289 E77 E90 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 PB74 RA874 T89; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1234; 04:55PM; 14920 W Raymer St; MAP: https://bit.ly/444N801; #VanNuys; Firefighters responded to a department store with a small fire inside, held in check by sprinklers. Firefighters extinguished the remaining flames, and are now working to shut off the sprinkler flow and evacuate smoke from the structure. No reported injuries. Firefighters continue to search the structure for any remaining customers or employees to ensure there are no medical needs.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 CM40 CM42 E239 E290 E39 E7 E88 E90 EM14 RA7 RA88 RA90 T39 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0847; 01:24PM; 18830 W Bryant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CzlPz7; #Northridge; Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines to get water on the RV and tree fires, and successfully prevented flames from entering the nearby commercial building. It took 18 firefighters 18 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E287 E293 E70 RA70 RA896 T73 T87 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0847; 01:06PM; 18830 W Bryant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CzlPz7; #Northridge; RV on fire, flames spreading to nearby trees, and exposing a commercial structure to flames. Offensive mode.; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E273 E287 E293 E70 RA70 RA896 T73 T87 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1478; 07:27PM; 2311 E 1st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NewCDH; #BoyleHeights; It took 22 firefighters 12 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish flames in one first-floor unit of a two-story garden-style apartment. Firefighters spared the adjacent units from damage, with no reported injuries. The cause is under investigation.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E15 E2 E209 E25 RA25 T9; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
